name: Cyber Security Educational Game
description: An interactive escape room game developed with C# and Unity to create an engaging educational tool. Designed and implemented custom game mechanics for cyber security learning scenarios with play-testing to evaluate educational effectiveness.

name: Fake Tweet Classification Project
description: A machine learning project for classifying fake tweets using Python, Scikit-learn, and NLTK. Performed comprehensive data analysis and preprocessing of tweets, implemented Random Forest and Support Vector Machine models achieving F1 scores of 0.91 and 0.83 respectively.

name: Ad Auction Dashboard Group Project
description: A marketing campaign evaluation tool developed in Java and JavaFX as part of a Software Engineering Group Project. Responsible for SQL query development and optimization, GUI development using JavaFX, and comprehensive JUnit testing. Built with Maven for dependency management.
